page.title: 05THE ROSEHILL CENTRE
page.content: The Rosehill Centre is a training centre for mentally handicapped adults.The people who go there learn all sorts of different activities such as cooking,art,joinery and housework.They sometimes have an open day when they make things to sell.The handicapped people sometimes put plays on too. The Rosehill Centre is run by the Social Work Department. Some of the handicaps are the result of Downs Syndrome, vaccine damage, brain damage at birth and accidents. The social workers are taught how to cope with these people. I think the Rosehill Centre is a good place because it teaches the handicapped how to cope with life.
